resources.string: 이 앱의 설명을 찾을 수 없습니다. 새로고침 해 보세요
사용자 이름이 유효하지 않은 문자를 포함합니다
VNC 비밀번호가 유효하지 않은 문자를 포함합니다
그 이름은 리눅스가 차지할 가능성이 있어 파일시스템 이름으로 사용할 수 없습니다
파일 시스템 이름은 \"/:*\\| 같은 문자를 포함하지 않은 1~50자 이어야합니다

로컬 저장소에 내보내기를 실패하였습니다 백업할 파일 시스템을 결정하지 못하였습니다. 다시 시도해 주세요. 외부 공개 저장소에 백업 복사를 실패하였습니다. 우리가 필요한 라이브러리가 없는 것 같네요! 초기 셋업이 실패한 것 같네요. GitHub에 문의해 주세요. 우리가 찾는 라이브러리가 없는 것 같네요. GitHub에 문의해 주세요. 파일 시스템 삭제를 실패하였습니다. 모든 세션을 정지하고 다시 시도해 주세요.
Http 에러: %1$s 다운로드를 계속할 수 없습니다. 외부 저장장치가 발견되지 않았습니다. 파일이 이미 존재합니다. Unknown File Error HTTP 정보 프로세싱 에러. 외부 저장장치의 저장공간이 부족합니다. 너무 많은 리다이렉션. Unhandled HTTP response code. Unknown Error. Error code unknown. Reason not available. 대기 시키지 않은 것들의 다운로드를 완료하려고 했습니다.
%1$s \n우리는 문제를 해결하려고 노력하고 있습니다. GitHub에 이 문제를 알림으로 서 저희를 도울 수 있습니다!
UserLAnd는 유효하지 않은 상태에 있습니다.
Bad state transition: %1$s
Both a session and an app have been selected when permissions are granted. Neither a session nor app have been selected when permissions are granted.
Credentials have been submitted for a filesystem, but one has not been selected. App preference submitted, but one has not been selected. Trying to start app preparation, but no app has been selected. Could not fetch apps database entries. Could not copy app script.
Trying to handle session preparation before one has been selected. Failed to retrieve asset lists.
Could not reach remote host while generating download requirements. Make sure you have a strong network connection and try again.
Downloads have failed due to: %1$s. Failed to copy assets to local storage. Try clearing support files. Assets need to be copied to your filesystem, but it looks like they have not been downloaded. Try clearing support files. The downloads cache was empty when access was attempted. Failed to copy assets to filesystem. Try clearing support files. Failed to extract filesystem. Try clearing support files. Failure reason: %1$s Failed to clear support files. Failed to detect sufficient storage. Try increasing the available storage on your device to at least 250 MB. Trying to start a session with an unknown service type. Busybox is required for this operation. Try running a session to make sure it is installed.
Filesystem: Service Type: Client Type: Please select a connection type: Select filesystem backup file Please install a File Manager
Services Persistent services UserLAnd UserLAnd is running a background service.
Getting things ready for you… Fetching asset lists… Checking whether updates are required… Downloading required assets… %1$d out of %2$d complete Copying downloaded files to local storage… Verifying sufficient storage available… 파일 시스템 셋업 중… 압축 해제 중: %1$s 자원 유효 확인 중… 서비스 시작 중… 모든 지원 파일 삭제… 파일 시스템 내보내기 중 파일 시스템 삭제 중
App Preferences 기본 메인 페이지 Select the page you would like to open the app with. PRoot 설정 PRoot 디버깅 로그가 활성화되었 Only necessary if having problems with the app. Log file stored at\n/mnt/sdcard/PRoot_Debug_Log 디버그 로그 수준 숫자가 높을 수록 더 많은 로그 -1 오래된 디버그 파일 삭제
Experiencing bugs or want to request a feature? Our Github page is the best place to go to get a fast response. 현재 지원하는 서비스: 터미널: 앱: Apps are the easiest way to launch common Linux applications. 세션: Sessions start a server on a filesystem, which then allows you to connect to it using a third-party client application. Filesystems: Filesystems are just what they sound like: A collection of users and a file structure that allows Linux-like behavior.
SSH - Dropbear VNC - TightVNC
SSH VNC XSDL
네! <string name="button_negative>아니요. 괜찮습니다 네 Cancel 예기치 못한 일이 벌어졌습니다 We\'re creating a filesystem for your apps.\nPlease enter the relevant required information for us to use as defaults for this filesystem. All sessions need to be deactivated to continue this action. Successfully imported backup Unable to import backup Successfully exported backup Unable to export backup Export started, please wait
Clear all support files?
This will delete all support files. This will not affect anything you have created on your filesystems. It will cause assets to be downloaded again the next time a session or app is run.
Clear
We\'re having trouble accessing the Google Play services to complete this action. Please try again later, and if the problem continues report it to a developer. Paid apps require access to the Google Play Store for verification of payment. Please install it to continue. It looks like your version of the Play Store is too old to support subscriptions. Please update it to continue. Can\'t find a client app! You\'ll need an SSH or VNC or XSDL client to complete this action, but it looks like you don\'t have the play store installed. \n\nPlease install the client application (SSH/VNC/XSDL) associated with the session\'s client type to continue.
UserLAnd requires permissions! To continue, enable storage permissions to allow UserLAnd to download files and move them from external storage to app local storage. Cancel
Refreshing apps requires an available or stronger network connection.
Low storage capacity To ensure smooth functionality of a filesystem in UserLAnd, ensure there is at least 1 GB of free space.
No wifi! A large asset (~80mb) needs to be downloaded. Continue Turn On Wifi Cancel
Sessions require a unique name! Filesystems require a unique name! UserLAnd currently only supports a single active session! Debug log exported successfully! Exporting debug log failed! Debug log deleted! Backup successfully exported!
Image: Arrow denoting connection between session and filesystem. Image: Distribution logo Image: App Icon Placeholder
Placeholder text Custom Sessions Apps Sessions Finish app setup to make these options available. Stop this app to change its settings. XSDL is not fully supported on Android 9.0 and above yet No filesystem import selected
Enjoying UserLAnd? How about a rating on the Play Store, then? Would you mind giving us some feedback on Github?
Can you help support UserLAnd development? How much can you contribute? Do you want to see other ways you can help the project? How often? Once Yearly Monthly Process
Opt-in to error reporting Allow us to collect error reports to improve UserLAnd. Would you like to help UserLAnd become more stable by sending us error reports? Opt-in to error log collection service? Are you sure? You can change this setting later in the settings page. OK, I will opt-in.
File access has changed!
The next version of Android, Q, is making improvements to security which affect our app and how our users are able to get files in and out of UserLAnd filesystems. In order to comply with these changes, using \"/sdcard\" to move files in and out will no longer behave as it used to. Please visit our wiki on our Github to learn more.
Fill out the same: \n\n\u2022 username \n\u2022 password \n\u2022 VNC password \n\u2022 distribution \n\n as the backup to ensure smooth functionality
